Song.title: Your Hand Upon Me
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Eric Grover Â© 2001 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Dm C | Bb F | Dm C | Bb2]
Verse 1: [Dm]O Lord You have [C]searched me And [Bb]You know my [F]ways You per[Dm]ceive all my [C]thoughts from af[Bb2]ar Your [Dm]hand is up[C]on me wher[Am7]ever I g[Bb]o Before [Eb]I form each word{,} You already [Csus | C]know
Chorus: If I rise on the [F]wings of the [C]dawn You are [Bb]there If I rest on the [Dm]far [A]side of the [Bb]sea Your love hems me [F]in Both be[C]hind and be[Dm Dm/C]fore You have [Bb]laid Your [C]hand upon[Dm] me [A] You have [Bb]laid Your [C]hand upon [Dm C | Bb F | Dm C | Bb2]me
Verse 2: [Dm]Where can I fl[C]ee{,} from Your [Bb]presence, O [F]Lord If I [Dm]sleep in the d[C]epths You are [Bb]there Your [Dm]day will cons[C]ume all the [Am7]Shadows of [Bb]night The [Eb]dark cannot hide{,} from Your brilliant [Csus | C]light
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o lord you have searched me and you know my ways you perceive all my thoughts from afar your hand is upon me wherever i go before i form each word you already know chorus if i rise on the wings of the dawn you are there if i rest on the far side of the sea your love hems me in both behind and before you have laid your hand upon me you have laid your hand upon me verse 2 where can i flee from your presence o lord if i sleep in the depths you are there your day will consume all the shadows of night the dark cannot hide from your brilliant light
